name: Comedy
description: Christopher Booker's archetypal plot where confusion and misunderstanding lead to joyful resolution
distribution_philosophy: Based on Booker's comedy structure with emphasis on building confusion and the satisfying resolution

initial_situation.name: Initial Situation
initial_situation.description: Characters are introduced in a state of confusion or potential conflict

complication.name: Complication
complication.description: Misunderstandings and confusion multiply, creating comic situations

development.name: Development
development.description: The confusion reaches its peak, with maximum comic potential

crisis.name: Crisis
crisis.description: The confusion threatens to become serious, requiring resolution

resolution.name: Resolution
resolution.description: All misunderstandings are cleared up, leading to harmony and joy
